John Kerry: s involvement in lobbying efforts to preserve the 2015 Iran nuclear deal, including meetings with Iranian Foreign Minister Javad Zarif and phone calls to European officials and members of Congress.
Congressional Republicans: outcry over Kerry's private meetings, alleging that he may have undermined U.S. foreign policy interests.
Sen: Marco Rubio's letter to the Justice Department requesting an investigation into Kerry's meetings.
PolitiFact: s previous findings of unsubstantiated claims regarding Kerry's secret meetings with Iranian officials and false reports of Kerry facing prison charges under the Logan Act.
